Package com.magnet.async

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsyncController<T extends com.magnet.controller.spi.Controller>
    A marker interface for an asynchronous controller.
    Call<T>
    This interface represents an asynchronous invocation to a controller.
    CallManager
    This interface provides the basic cache management, queue management, and reliable calls management.
    Constraint
    A constraint specifies when an asynchronous invocation can be submitted.
    Options
    A base interface for asynchronous call options and reliable call options.
    StateListener
    The listener to be invoked in the UI thread when the call state is changed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncCallOptions
    Options for an asynchronous call.
    ReliableCallOptions
    Options for a reliable asynchronous call.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Call.State
